attributes.action: Help us to recycle by ensuring manufacturers use recyclable materials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ban product manufacturers from using materials which cannot be recycled by consumers in their local area.
Some of us do want to recycle and do not want to be punished in taxes for failing to do so.
How can consumers be expected to reduce household waste if companies are not using recyclable packaging and materials?

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/zerovatrecycled/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
